description: Enable interaction with Slack workspaces. Supports subscribing to Slack events through Resources.

tools.name: slack_list_channels
tools.description: List public or pre-defined channels in the workspace with pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of channels to return (default 100, max 200)

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for next page of results

tools.name: slack_post_message
tools.description: Post a new message to a Slack channel or reply to a thread

thread_ts.description: Optional. The timestamp of the parent message to reply to in the format '1234567890.123456'. When provided, the message will be posted as a reply to the thread.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel to post to

tools.name: slack_add_reaction
tools.description: Add a reaction emoji to a message

reaction.description: The name of the emoji reaction (without ::)

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the message to react to

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel containing the message

tools.name: slack_get_channel_history
tools.description: Get recent messages from a channel

tools.name: slack_get_thread_replies
tools.description: Get all replies in a message thread

thread_ts.description: The timestamp of the parent message in the format '1234567890.123456'. Timestamps in the format without the period can be converted by adding the period such that 6 numbers come after it.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel containing the thread

tools.name: slack_get_users
tools.description: Get a list of all users in the workspace with their basic profile information

limit.description: Maximum number of users to return (default 100, max 200)

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for next page of results

tools.name: slack_get_user_profile
tools.description: Get detailed profile information for a specific user
